ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T17:47:27 [Issue ID 4000-41507] urn:comicvine:4000-41507 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev43 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-04-18 22:20:56. [Issue ID 41507]
ComicInfo.Summary: Star appears and attempts to rescue Klaptin from the Vicious Circle and LaSalle, and Klaptin recalls how he originally was Star, but passed the mantle on to his bodyguard, Chris Robinson. Together, Klaptin and Star defeat Moregore, Inferno, Hellrazor, Mako, LaSalle, and Sucarno. Klaptin then fires Star/Robinson as his bodyguard for not "guarding his body."
